text: Love Marie Payawal Ongpauco-Escudero (born February 14, 1985) known as Heart Evangelista is a Filipina actress and TV host. She is married to Chiz Escudero and also referred to as the first lady of Sorsogon. == References == Category:Filipino actors Category:1985 births Category:People from Bicol Region
title: Heart Evangelista
